config.name: generation
config.param: "ndos.gdml" name of file containing the detector geometry. useful for when trying out new geometries
"mono" type of fluxes to use in generation - histogram, ntuple, or mono
"numi" beam to use - numi or booster
0 If non-zero, spills with no interactions will still be passed along. This would be the desired behavior if running, say, GENIE and CRY together.
0 set the random number seed to use, if 0, let TRandom3 pick it, otherwise use the given seed
